Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Classes
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.provider.WeatherProviderFactory
          You shouldn't use this class anymore to instantiate a weather provider from 1.4. Use instead WeatherClient.ClientBuilder 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.createProvider(IProviderType, WeatherConfig)
          Version 1.4 use instead WeatherClient.ClientBuilder 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(String, WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
          1.5.0 Use instead WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.StandardHttpClient.getCurrentCondition(String, WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
          use instead WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.getForecastWeather(String, WeatherClient.ForecastWeatherEventListener)
          1.5.0 Use instead WeatherClient.getForecastWeather(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.ForecastWeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.StandardHttpClient.getForecastWeather(String, WeatherClient.ForecastWeatherEventListener)
          use instead WeatherClient.getForecastWeather(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.ForecastWeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.getHistoricalWeather(String, Date, Date, WeatherClient.HistoricalWeatherEventListener)
          1.5.0 WeatherClient.getHistoricalWeather(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, java.util.Date, java.util.Date, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.HistoricalWeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.StandardHttpClient.getHistoricalWeather(String, Date, Date, WeatherClient.HistoricalWeatherEventListener)
          use instead WeatherClient.getHistoricalWeather(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, java.util.Date, java.util.Date, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.HistoricalWeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.getHourForecastWeather(String, WeatherClient.HourForecastWeatherEventListener)
          1.5.0 use instead WeatherClient.getHourForecastWeather(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.HourForecastWeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.StandardHttpClient.getHourForecastWeather(String, WeatherClient.HourForecastWeatherEventListener)
          use instead WeatherClient.getHourForecastWeather(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.HourForecastWeatherEventListener) 
com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.StandardHttpClient.getInstance()
          Release 1.4 repleaced by WeatherClient.ClientBuilder
